reviews.review_msg: I really enjoyed Jon's lecturing style however I found it quite difficult to keep up with how much we had to read considering a full course load.

Jon is extremely passionate about Southern Literature, and I am sure I would be if I actually got to read any. This class was extremely unorganized and I often missed readings because I was unaware he had assigned them because he would email and update canvas and it was extremely confusing. Nice guy, could be a good teacher

As amusing as ever, this class on Literature & the Internet had Ogden at his best: thoroughly knowledgeble, smart as a button, spontaneous and highly entertaining. Went to great length to organize wonderful guest-speaker lectures. Again, very fair and extremely friendly when dealing with students. Hard work but totally worth it!
